thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand | smartbuyglasses.co.nz
thread.title: Kevin
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand reviewed by Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text: I purchased a pair of prescription glasses and it said they had no available stock and it needed to be back ordered. I emailed and received an automated response not answering any of my questions and now i feel as though i have been scammed. I have also tried calling their number in Wellington but turns out the number cant be dialed and i am unsure as to what is going on
